name: Deus Vult!
description:
Click and kill, there isn't much more, just that.

Play as a knight, ranger or wizard and try to survive and score as much as you can, until the game restarts if any of the monsters catches you!

Use the keys W,A,S,D or the arrow keys to move and the left mouse button to shoot. Cover from the big ogres proyectiles using the trees in the middle of the map.

Background art was made by Kemono from https://opengameart.org/users/kemono

Music was made by SketchyLogic from https://opengameart.org/users/sketchylogic

Hope you have a bit of fun at least!
